class.name: SiOPMSoundChip
class.description: It is responsible for maintaining output buffers and pipes, populated by channels and effectors and consumed by the driver. [b]Warning:[/b] This class currently has no intended use in the API. If you need this class and its unexposed methods in your project, please [b][url=https://github.com/YuriSizov/gdsion/issues]create a feature request with your use case[/url][/b]!

constants.constant: Maximum number of stream buffers used by various components and modules.
